title: What do you think of The Psychedelic Furs releasing a comeback album, and were you fans of their older music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Having seen them 3 times (I keep thinking it’s 4 times, but I can only nail down 3) since 2009 I’ve been basically content that they played only old music because they didn’t have new music, but them making new music makes me even more willing to go see them again.

Glad to hear they’re finally putting new music out after such a long break - have always been a fan of their classic 80s output (“Love My Way” & “Heartbeat” especially), so will await the new album with interest……
